comment.text: This translation key is used for displaying an error message when copying a file to a folder. The error message includes the title of the file being copied and its destination folder name. It appears in a dialog or UI component where a copy operation fails.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation preserves the `<2>` and `<1>` tags. These tags are likely meant to be removed or handled by the application and shouldn't be part of the translation itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the `<2>` and `<1>` tags from the Arabic translation.  The application should handle these tags to insert the `title` and `folderName` respectively.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'kopyalama xətası' directly translates to 'copy error'. While understandable, a more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani would be something like 'nümunəyə köçürmə xətası' (attempt to copy error) or 'köçürmə zamanı xətası' (error during copy).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: nümunəyə köçürmə xətası or köçürmə zamanı xətası

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of the tags in the Azerbaijani translation is incorrect. The Azerbaijani version reverses the order of `<2>` and `<1>`. The original format has <2>{{title}}</2> before <1>{{folderName}}</1>, which should be replicated in the Azerbaijani version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <2>{{title}}</2>-i <1>{{folderName}}</1> qovluğuna nümunəyə köçürmə xətası

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'copy' is not accurately translated. 'Error copying' implies a transfer action, while 'Грешка при обработка на' (Error processing) suggests a more general issue. A more accurate translation of 'copy' would be something along the lines of 'при копиране' (during copying).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Грешка при копиране на <2>{{title}}</2> в <1>{{folderName}}</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tags `<2>` and `<1>` are reversed in the Greek translation compared to the English original. This will likely result in incorrect rendering.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change the Greek translation to: "Σφάλμα αντιγραφής <1>{{title}}</1> στον φάκελο <2>{{folderName}}</2>"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The preposition 'en' (in) is used instead of 'a' (to) when referring to copying a file to a folder. 'Error al copiar' should be 'Error al copiar a'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Error al copiar a <1>{{folderName}}</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'kopioitaessa' (when copying) sounds awkward and overly formal. A more natural phrasing would be 'kopioitaessa' or 'kun kopioidaan'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Virhe kun kopioidaan <2>{{title}}</2> kohteeseen <1>{{folderName}}</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'to' is unnecessarily included in the Armenian translation. It doesn't accurately reflect the English meaning in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Պատճենման սխալ <2>{{title}}</2> <1>{{folderName}}</1>-ին

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation lacks a proper verb agreement with the subject 'copying'. It appears as a phrase rather than a complete sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Պատճենման սխալ տեղի ունեցավ <2>{{title}}</2> <1>{{folderName}}</1>-ի մեջ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Error copying" is translated as "コピー中にエラーが発生しました" which literally means "An error occurred during copying". While understandable, a more direct and natural translation of "Error copying" would be something like "コピー エラーが発生しました" or "コピー中に問題が発生しました".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: コピー エラーが発生しました

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the XML tags are present, the sentence flow and naturalness of the Japanese could be improved to better suit the format. Specifically, the phrasing "を” is slightly awkward when combined with the XML tags.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <2>{{title}}</2>のコピー中に<1>{{folderName}}</1>へエラーが発生しました

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation '을/를' indicates uncertainty in the grammatical particle. It should be adjusted based on the preceding noun's formality and definiteness. Without context of what '<2>{{title}}</2>' is, it's impossible to choose the correct particle.  The literal translation is awkward; a more natural rendering might be something like '파일 <2>{{title}}</2>를 <1>{{folderName}}</1> 폴더로 복사하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다' (File <2>{{title}}</2> copying to <1>{{folderName}}</1> folder resulted in an error).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Analyze the noun represented by '<2>{{title}}</2>' to determine whether to use '을' or '를'. Consider rewording for a more natural Korean flow, potentially adding '파일' (file) for clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation includes '폴더로' which implies 'to folder'.  The original English uses 'to' before the folder name. This is replicated in the translation, but it feels slightly unnatural in Korean in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '폴더에' instead of '폴더로' or removing it entirely. For example: '<2>{{title}}</2>을/를 <1>{{folderName}}</1> 폴더에서 복사하는 중 오류가 발생했습니다' or '<2>{{title}}</2>을/를 <1>{{folderName}}</1> 폴더로 복사하는 중 오류가 발생했습니다' (depending on the particle choice).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຜົນບົດບົກປະສູດ" (pon bot bok prasut) translates to "result of operation" or "result of procedure," which isn't the best fit for 'Error'. A more direct translation of 'Error' would be 'ຜິດພາດ' (phit phat) or 'ຄວາມຜິດພາດ' (khwam phit phat).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜິດພາດໃນການສໍາເນົາ <2>{{title}}</2> ໄປສູ່ <1>{{folderName}}</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ໄປສູ່' (pai su) for 'to' can sound slightly formal or literary. Depending on the tone of the application, a simpler 'ຫາ' (ha) might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜິດພາດໃນການສໍາເນົາ <2>{{title}}</2> ຫາ <1>{{folderName}}</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation "Kļūda, kopējot" should be "Kļūda kopējot" or "Radās kļūda kopējot". Adding the comma isn't grammatically correct in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kļūda kopējot

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Eroare la copiere a' is not the most natural way to express 'Error copying'. A more idiomatic translation would be 'Eroare la copiere'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Eroare la copiere

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation "<2>{{title}}</2> <1>{{folderName}}</1> වෙත පිටපත් කිරීමේදී දෝෂයකි" literally translates to "Error in copying <2>{{title}}</2> <1>{{folderName}}</1> to". The English original uses "to" to indicate destination, but the Sinhala wording implies a more general 'towards' or 'into', which doesn't quite convey the intended meaning. A more accurate translation would indicate the destination is a folder or location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <2>{{title}}</2> <1>{{folderName}}</1> වෙත පිටපත් කිරීමට හැකි වුවාට දෝෂයක් සිදු විය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation retains the same HTML-like tags (<2>, <1>) as the English original. While this might be intentional for some internal processing, it's unusual and potentially confusing for users. The tags should be removed for a more natural-sounding translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: title, folderName යනුවෙන් දැක්වුණු ගොනෙකු <1>{{folderName}}</1> වෙත පිටපත් කිරීමේදී දෝෂයකි

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Error copying' is not accurately translated. 'Error copying' implies an action in progress that failed. The Turkish translation 'kopyalanırken hata oluştu' literally means 'an error occurred while copying', which is a valid translation but doesn't convey the same sense of interruption as the English original. A more accurate translation would convey the action failed to complete.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bir hata oluştu, <2>{{title}}</2>, <1>{{folderName}}</1> dosyası kopyalanamadı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag order is reversed between English and Turkish. English: `<2>{{title}}</2> to <1>{{folderName}}</1>`. Turkish: `<2>{{title}}</2>, <1>{{folderName}}</1>` but with the content order reversed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The tag order should match the English order: `<2>{{title}}</2> konumuna, <1>{{folderName}}</1> kopyalanırken hata oluştu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Error copying' directly translates to '复制时出错' (copying when error) which is correct, but a more natural translation would be '复制...时发生错误' or '复制...失败了'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 复制...时发生错误
